name: OpenOCR
body:
### Welcome to OpenOCR

We are currently trying to add state-of-the-art OCR functionality to OpenCamera, an open-source android app. However, the app is currently in the initial stages of development. Please contact any author if you would like to get involved.

Thanks for showing interest in our work. 

### Authors and Contributors
- Siddhartha Dutta
- Siddhant Rajagopalan
- Nikhil Vyas 
- Maulik Shah
- Shivaram Kalyanakrishnan

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with OpenOCR? Check out our [wiki](https://github.com/sidutta/OpenOCR/wiki) or [contact Siddhartha](mailto:siddhartha_dutta@live.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
